_header: Women beth both good and sheen
Subjects: women, praise of; carols, of women; Virgin Mary, praise of
_description: A song in praise of women — five quatrains with refrain, ‘Witnesse on Marie’, and burden: ‘Wymmen beth bothe goude & truwe / Wytnesse on marie’

BLHar7358.First Lines:
Wymmen bee boþe goude & truwe wytnesse on MarieWymmen be
                    boþe goud & schene…
BLHar7358.Last Lines:
…ffro sorwe & care hy wol hemvs
                    bryngWymmen ys flour of all þyng
